content.text: I like to take my time getting ready and grab a quick coffee before I head out the door
Me too! I am a night owl, but my cat wakes me up every morning
I love cats. I have a few of them. I am a nurse and work in an emergency room at a busy hospital
That is an amazing job! I play guitar in an indie band and work at a coffee shop
That is so cool! I have always wanted to play an instrument. I love going barefoot, but people sometimes worry I am crazy
I love going barefoot too. I think it feels great. I am sad that my laptop's battery is faulty.
Oh no! That is so annoying. I am sure you can get it fixed. I like to do laundry once a week to keep my home clean and tidy
Me too! I like to keep my space clean and organized. I should probably do laundry today
Good idea! I am going to go do some laundry now. It was nice talking to you!
